The updates maintained 90% of the existing content while reframing the learning journey to be more tangible and component-focused rather than philosophical.

The JSON followed the BEIT template layouts specified in the user's documentation, incorporating exact layout names like "24_Table with headers," "2_Section Header," and "21_One Column and an Image On the Right."
